name: Kelly's Black Bean Salad
author: Chelsea
summary: My sister Kelly makes this AMAZING salad anytime we have a family get-together. It is loved by everyone in the family. The Mexican flavor is is unbeatable! Keeps in the fridge for up to a week!
ingredients: 3 (15.5 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed
½ (10 ounce) box frozen corn, thawed
directions: Bring rice and water to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes
Mix tomatoes, vinegar, garlic, cumin, chili powder, salt, oregano, and black pepper together in a bowl
Whisk oil into tomato mixture to make a dressing
Stir rice, black beans, and corn together in a bowl; toss with dressing until well-coated
